refnamediv.refpurpose: Scales the values in a range of a vector (one dimensional array).

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The scalet opcode scales a subregion of a vector to a given minimum/maximum.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: scalet tarray, kmin, kmax[, kleft, kright]

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: kmin, kmax -- target minimum and maximum values.
kleft, kright -- range of table to use, defaulting to 0 and size of the vector.
